Callback26Header: Find the Zakarum holy symbol in Tomb of the Saints
Phase27Description: Priest Amr told me of a relic used to honor the dead kept within the tombs beneath the church. I should find it before thieves do.
Callback10Header: Return the artifact to the Zakarum Church
Phase33Description: The relic has been stolen. The thief must be nearby. I should find them and reclaim the artifact.
Phase11Description: I caught the thief and was able to reclaim the Zakarum relic. Amr will be glad to see it returned.
Toast: A Zakarum relic is coveted by unscrupulous collectors. Ensure it stays with the church.
Name: Symbol of Faith
